origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'EnergyMarket.get_opec_decision', 'description': 'Get the latest decision made by OPEC+ regarding oil production cuts.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'organization', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the organization, e.g., OPEC+.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'decision', 'description': 'A dictionary containing details about the latest production cut decision.'}]}, {'name': 'TechPolicy.get_policy_changes', 'description': 'Get recent changes in technology policies of major countries.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'country', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the country, e.g., USA, China.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'policy_changes', 'description': 'A list of dictionaries containing recent policy changes in the specified country.'}]}, {'name': 'TechPolicy.analyze_impact', 'description': 'Analyze the impact of a specific event on technology policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'event', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name or description of the event, e.g., OPEC+ production cut.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_analysis', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis of the impact on technology policies.'}]}, {'name': 'TechPolicy.evaluate_impact', 'description': 'Evaluate the overall impact of a specific event on global technology policies.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'event', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name or description of the event, e.g., OPEC+ production cut.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'impact_evaluation', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the overall evaluation of the impact on global technology policies.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
我想了解欧佩克+组织减产决定对全球科技政策的影响。首先，获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。然后，获取全球主要国家（如美国、中国）的科技政策变化数据。接着，分析这些数据以确定减产对科技政策的影响。最后，提供基于这些分析的科技政策影响评估。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取欧佩克+组织最近一次减产决定的详细信息。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'organization'的值是什么?
